intro: Olfersia vestita, commonly known as the white star apple, is a tropical plant native to the Caribbean and Central America. It is a small tree or shrub that produces small, white, star-shaped flowers. The plant's leaves are simple, alternate, and have a velvety texture. Its fruit is a small, round berry that turns from green to yellow when ripe. The botanical features of Olfersia vestita make it a distinctive and ornamental plant in tropical gardens.
